name: White Wolf of Eldwood
cardText:
Storm.
[lastwords] Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may put a [forestcraft] follower from among them onto your field. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effectText.body: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may put a [forestcraft] follower from among them onto your field. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Elf Girl Liza
cardText: While this card is on your field, your followers take 1 less damage from enemy abilities.

name: Elf Knight Cynthia
cardText:
Rush.
Strike, banish a card in your EX area: Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Deal it 2 damage and summon 2 Fairy tokens.

name: Crystalia Lily
cardText:
[evolve][cost02]: Evolve this follower.

cardText: On Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Baalt, King of the Elves
cardText: [fanfare] Choose one of the following. (1) Select a Pixie follower on your field and give it [attack]+2/[defense]+2. (2) Search your deck for a Pixie follower, reveal it, and add it to your hand.
